tags.name: Shipment
tags.description:
Shipment API's
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

Url:- https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.1/create/shipment

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.1/create/shipment"

payload = json.dumps({
  "oShipData": {
    "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",
    "Service Level": "PL",
    "Close Time": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Close Date": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Shipper Name": "LLYN STRONG",
    "Shipper Address 1": "119 NORTH MAIN STREET",
    "Shipper Address 2": "417 Oakbend Blvd.",
    "Shipper City": "GREENVILLE",
    "Shipper State": "SC",
    "Shipper Zip": 29601,
    "Shipper Country": "US",
    "Shipper Phone": 8642335900,
    "Shipper Contact": "KATE",
    "Shipper Email": "ash@yahoo.com",
    "Consignee Name": "SOLIDSCAPE, INC.",
    "Consignee Address 1": "316 DANIEL WEBSTER HIGHWAY",
    "Consignee Address 2": "apt 345",
    "Consignee City": "MERRIMACK",
    "Consignee State": "NH",
    "Consignee Zip": 3054,
    "Consignee Country": "US",
    "Consignee Phone": "603 429-9700",
    "Consignee Contact": "Marilyn King",
    "Consignee Email": "mking@solidscape.com",
    "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
    "Shipment Line List": [
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
        "Weight": "5",
        "Height": "4.0",
        "Length": "2.0",
        "Width": "3.0",
        "Pieces": "4",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "in",
        "PieceType": "CYL",
        "Hazmat": "1"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test TestTest",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      }
    ],
    "Reference List": [
      {
        "Reference No": "RMA 32768"
      }
    ],
    "New Shipment Accessorials List": [
      {
        "Code": "PALL"
      },
      {
        "Code": "SHRNK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "WEEK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "HOLPU"
      },
      {
        "Code": "LIMPU"
      }
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'x-api-key': 'Rooxp9YQWT6o10WziF3D1as9PV4gozbm5hpiXpxI',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request POST 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.1/create/shipment' \
--header 'x-api-key: Rooxp9YQWT6o10WziF3D1as9PV4gozbm5hpiXpxI' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "oShipData":{
        "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",

        "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
      "Shipment Line List":[
         {
            "Description":"TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
            "Weight":"5",

            "DimUOMV3":"cm",

         },
         {
            "Description":"TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232"

payload="<file contents here>"
headers = {
  'x-api-key': 'Rooxp9YQWT6o10WziF3D1as9PV4gozbm5hpiXpxI',
  'Content-Type': 'text/plain'
}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)
